# drawable

**Instance Property**

The Metal drawable your app uses to render the next frame.

## Declaration

```swift
var drawable: any CAMetalDrawable { get }
```

## Drawing the Next Frame

- **targetTimestamp**: A deadline that indicates when your app needs to finish rendering to the drawable.

items.description: A deadline that indicates when your app needs to finish rendering to the drawable.
